reviewText: The instruction pamphlet that was supposed to be in with the dvd wasn't there. Please send me one,this is first time I have ever had a problem. Thank you.

This short instruction video (~30 minutes) starts simple but the pace increases considerably as it progresses. Learners may need to stop, rewind, and rewatch. The instructor reviews the string names, teaches a scale, then shows some progressions the learner can develop. It is a real crash course which I use to help others incorporate the bass into their musical skill set. I would suggest that viewers should have some skill on string instruments before watching. I found non-string players tend to get left behind as the video progresses.
